com.ubudu.indoorlocation

Interface UbuduMap


  • public interface UbuduMap
    Interface describing a map dedicated for UbuduIndoorLocation use.

    • Method Summary

      • proximityUUID

      • zones

        java.util.List<UbuduZone> zones()
        Returns:
        list of the map's polygon zones.

      • getZoneByID

        UbuduZone getZoneByID(int id)
        Parameters:
        id - id of the polygon zone
        Returns:
        zone of given id, null if no zone of the given id is avaible.

      • getZoneByName

        UbuduZone getZoneByName(java.lang.String name)
        Parameters:
        name - name of the zone
        Returns:
        zone according to given name, null if there is no UbuduZone with given name.

      • getZonesByTag

        java.util.List<UbuduZone> getZonesByTag(java.lang.String tag)
        Parameters:
        tag - tag name
        Returns:
        list of zones that contain the given tag.

      • getClosestNavigablePointFromPosition

        UbuduPoint getClosestNavigablePointFromPosition(UbuduPoint position)
        Parameters:
        position - point coordinates
        Returns:
        navigable point that is closest to the given position.

      • topLeftAnchorCoordinates

        UbuduCoordinates2D topLeftAnchorCoordinates()
        Returns:
        geographical coordinates of the top left anchor of the map.

      • bottomRightAnchorCoordinates

        UbuduCoordinates2D bottomRightAnchorCoordinates()
        Returns:
        geographical coordinates of the bottom right anchor of the map.

      • imageUrl

        java.lang.String imageUrl()
        Returns:
        url to the map image file.

      • path

        java.util.List<UbuduPoint> path(UbuduPoint p1,
                                UbuduPoint p2)
        Parameters:
        p1 - start location
        p2 - end location
        Returns:
        path from p1 to p2
